這個遊戲不同於以往沙龍遊戲哦，是壹款籌備婚禮沙龍的遊戲。<p>每壹個女孩都想要壹個完美的婚禮因為這壹生成為新娘是壹個很重要的時間。新娘婚禮前的時間是最忙的，她需要妳的幫助來設計她的發型，妳可以選擇最美麗的發型並進行染色。接下來為新娘化妝和換裝的時刻也是考驗妳的完美搭配的能力哦！</p><p>當妳在街區的時候，妳會收到伴娘的邀請，去教堂，去逛街，或者去砂糖哦。妳必須先要到她家幫助她搭配相對應的著裝才能去呢。如果妳搭配正確，伴娘也會送給妳神秘禮物哦！<br>在妳的婚房裏，妳的新郎在那裏等候妳幫他換裝哦，妳需要把妳的新郎打扮的帥帥的！</p><p>在婚房中，妳需要用伴娘送給妳的各種家具來更好的搭配妳的婚房哦。妳壹定會喜歡這些禮物的，但是前提務必幫伴娘打扮正確才可以呢！而且只有當妳收到伴娘電話邀請的時候才能進入到伴娘的家中。</p><p>遊戲太好玩了，快快進入到遊戲角色中開始吧！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> iTunes 商城獲得遊戲類 New and What's Hot 推薦 <br>收到來自世界各地玩家超過 100,000 筆 5 顆星評價 <br>=========== <p>治癒系蔓陀蘿全新面貌亮相！ </p><p>歡迎來到月貓村，這裡是巫師們最愛的園藝勝地，也是唯一在這個星球上可以找到蔓陀羅種子的地方。 </p><p>蔓陀羅不但是強力的魔法提煉素材，月貓村甚至將這種介於植物與動物、魔法與科學之間的生物培養成巫師女巫之間最流行的飾品或寵物。 短短幾年之間，數百種蔓陀羅在魔法世界流行了起來。 </p><p>-- 與臉書好友一起在生存模式裡競爭 -- <br>新增加的生存模式會隨著遊戲進行提高難度，還有專門啃蔓陀蘿葉子的菜蟲會來妨礙玩家。一邊克服重重困難一邊蒐集金幣來購買更具威力的道具，在森林中的菜園裡生存吧! </p><p>-- 在無限模式的月貓村農園裡盡情享受拔蔓陀蘿的樂趣 -- <br>玩家在遊戲中是負責收成蔓陀蘿的栽種師，在時限內盡可能拔出成熟的蔓陀蘿獲得高分，保持在連續拔出成熟蔓陀蘿 (Combo) 的狀態，就有機會得到稀有的新品種以及一瞬間提高分數的道具。 </p><p>-- 超可愛的栽種日誌紀錄遊戲歷程 -- <br>收成後的蔓陀蘿品種會紀錄在栽種日誌中，玩家可以隨時回來翻閱並且聽聽他們被拔出土裡時的各種叫聲，或是找找還有哪些品種沒有被蒐集到，日誌內都會有提示喔~ </p><p>-- 持續向上挑戰的稱號系統 -- <br>每次收成結束之後都會給予評價稱號，向最高稱號挑戰吧! </p><p><br>遊戲特色 <br>- 熱鬧又瘋狂，使用各種道具與臉書好友排名一較高下的生存模式 <br>- 能夠不斷超越向無上限的遊戲紀錄挑戰的無限模式 <br>- 超過 45 種可愛又逗趣的蔓陀蘿寶寶，吵鬧又治癒的迷人角色 <br>- 精緻讓人愛不釋手的繪本風格栽種日誌，在這裡回顧已經收成的蔓陀蘿 <br>- 農場紀錄：個人遊戲歷程，各種有趣的統計數據 <br>- Frozen Slushy Maker  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Kids+Food+Games+Inc." title="Kids Food Games Inc.">Kids Food Games Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.kidsfoodinc.android_make_slushy"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLQorEikKI2NvbS5raWRzZm9vZGluYy5hbmRyb2lkX21ha2Vfc2x1c2h5EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Ready to get your sweet ice drink fix? Slushy Maker is a fantastic way to create your own virtual fruit slushy without the mess! Choose from over 50 types of cups, add ice, sweet fruits and flavors of all colors, blend, add your favorite toppings and enjoy. It couldn't be easier!<p>The best ice drinks start with a fun cup. Slushy Maker features dozens of different types of lids and cups in many different designs, allowing you to pick the perfect one for your sweet colorful drink! Add ice to your chosen cup, then blend it into a smooth texture. Choose different flavors to add to your ice drink, then pick out fruits of many different colors. Blend it all together into a smooth, sweet drink, then pick out your favorite topping to decorate!</p><p>Features:<br>- Create your very own virtual ice slushy drink.<br>- Over 50 different cups to choose from.<br>- Tons of sweet flavors and colors to add.<br>- Blend your drink! Watch it stir!<br>- Add your favorite fruits as toppings.</p><p>How to Play:<br>- Pick out a drink cup and add ice.<br>- Select your favorite fruits, sweet flavors and colors.<br>- Mix everything together and give it a good blend.<br>- Add toppings for the perfect slushy treat!</p><p>-----------------------------<br>Join our Facebook Page: + YELLOWFEST=?</p><p>遊戲特點：<br>-可以各種可愛的魚苗可以養殖，甚至包括鯊魚<br>-魚兒的動畫活靈活現<br>-盡情發揮你的想像，用近百種的裝飾物、植物和背景來裝扮屬於你自己的個性水族箱<br>-簡單易用的點擊界面，讓你輕鬆遊戲<br>-華麗而又精細的圖案<br>-訪問魚友，幫他們餵魚、清理魚缸，升級社交聲譽，你將成為水族館的社交達人。</p><p>注意： 本遊戲需要網絡連接</p><p>---</p><p>Fish Live is the game for all fish lovers! Raised a fish lately? Play Fish Live and raise, feed and breed your own lovable fishes!</p><p>By playing this game you may find yourself hopelessly addicted to feeding and caring for adorable fishes, decorating your tanks with exotic tropical plants, and inviting others to view them in your own glorious tank.</p><p>Furthermore you can mix and match your fishes to make your own special fishes, e.g. ORANGESWING + YELLOWFEST = ?</p><p>GAME FEATURES:<br>- Dozens of adorable fishes to raise including sharks<br>- Fish come alive in your tank with awesome 3D animations<br>- Let your imagination run wild with hundreds of decorations, plants and backgrounds<br>- Simple and easy-to-use tap interface<br>- Beautiful and detailed graphics<br>- Visit, clean, feed your friends fishes and level up to become 'top' Candy's Restaurant  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Libii" title="Libii">Libii</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.libiitech.candyrestaurant"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5saWJpaXRlY2guY2FuZHlyZXN0YXVyYW50EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Every place got a story, but this one needs more attention than most. Here's the story. Our sweetie Candy has opened a restaurant in town, which attracts many foodies. Never got a Michelin-star though, this place has won a good reputation for its tasty foods and warm service. However, she feels a little overwhelmed recently, for the increasing number of customers keeps her two hands more than full. She really needs a sue chef's help to take a break.<p>We see the passion for cooking in your eyes, so do you think you can do this? Are you desperate to cook but concerned that you may make a mess, or afraid of hot stoves and sharp knives? Budding chef, dear. Don't worry, here you can cook freely without being troubled by those things. You'll be more than happy to make some handsome foods to sink the customer's teeth into grand feasts. The fantastic experience not just lies in cooking, but also in decorating and cleaning. Even dressing Candy will be a great joy.</p><p>It’s not easy to run a business, but trust us, you can definitely nail it. Honey, this is a place where cooking is no longer a have to do thing, but a pleasure. Let's take it to an art form!</p><p>How to play<br>Open the game, your first view will be the well-decorated lobby. See! The customer's already here, let's take his order. Click him to check the information related to the dish, which includes the picture and cooking steps. With carefully chosen ingredients and superb kitchen utensils, you can make a visually stunning and great tasting dish for sure. As you know every chef has his signature dish, it's also true that every restaurant has its secret recipe, which can be found on the right top. There are 5 secret recipes for each kind of food to be discovered. Exciting, huh? </p><p>To a chef, there's no place like restaurant, so you must want to improve this place more than anyone else. Now, wish granted! Each time you make a dish, you'll be awarded a loving heart, with which you can exchange for some top-notch decorations to beautify this place. You can click the loving heart icon on the top right to have a look. Wow~ that clean cart is so nice, let's work hard for it. Because you know, keeping this place in a clean and sanitary condition is also part of your job. Oh~ our dear is a little bit upset, hurry to check on her. Ah, she got no time to change her clothes the whole day, so why don't you give her a makeover?</p><p>Here's the journey of working your way to a master chef from a home cook. Chef, shall we set off?<br> <br>Features:<br>- 10 delicacies with great flavor are offered  <br>- 50 secret recipes are waiting for you to discover<br>- Dress up Candy and show us your wonderful taste in clothes<br>- Get in touch with the marvelous world of cooking<br>- Collect more loving hearts to make this place better   </p><p>About Libii Game:<br>With over 200 million downloads and growing, Libii is committed to creating innovative games for kids. We'll keep working on establishing a good relationship with both parents and their children and bringing a healthy, happy atmosphere for them.<br>Visit us: http://www.libii.com/<br>Like us: http://www.facebook.com/LibiiGame<br>Contact us:<br>Got any ideas? My Newborn Pet Baby  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Libii" title="Libii">Libii</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.libii.petnewbaby"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5saWJpaS5wZXRuZXdiYWJ5EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Do you sweeties have a deep and abiding love for dogs? Do you have such a furry pal at home who keeps you company all day long and follows you wherever you go? You love her despite a number of chewed shoes and a couple of murdered throw pillows. You two go for long walks, stop for ice cream with a sparkle in the eyes, and you think life couldn't be better. But one day, oh my! Your loving playmate is gonna have her baby. Wow, life is full of unexpected joy!<br>Now, it's your time to make her days as happy and comfortable as she has always made yours. Love and a lot of tender care are needed to make her go through the important days smoothly. You're gonna be busy for quite a while to make everything perfect for the love and her little.<br>Little puppy lover, your beloved pet needs special care. Arf! Arf! Come on, how can you not want to love a face like that?<p>How to play:<br>Open the game, you'll land on the living room where the adorable dogs are waiting. Now, choose one from those lovely furry friends to start: give her a checkup, decorate a room for the puppy, and don't forget she needs a little extra help from you to look her best. Snip, clip, cut hair, trim nails, you can groom her just like a pro. Here we go, trim out any mats with the razor to make the hairs flat and tidy and clip a small amount of nail with dog nail clippers. Wow, she looks fabulous, so it makes sense that the baby is a born beauty just like her. Oh, the little doesn't have her own room yet. How about you decorate one for her? We have prepared various accessory options for this special little space. Enter the room and choose from the accessories on the right, to create the sweetest room ever. Oh, the cute little thing, look at her. Kind of sleepy? Let's try and get the little peanut to take a nap. Zzz…Sweet dream, little darling! <br>Thank you for looking after them with your caring hearts! They have nothing to give you but their loving hearts, with which you can exchange fabulous items to decorate a cozy home for them. <br>Honey, doggies are always waiting for the sound of your steps, please come back home. Will you?</p><p>Features:<br>- 6 lovely dogs and little puppies to melt your heart<br>- 6 fantastic mini-games to blow your mind away<br>- Dress up cute furry friends with a heck lot of wonderful accessories <br>- Have fun at 5 fancy places with the adorable puppies<br>- Collect more loving hearts to sweeten the love-filled home.</p><p>About Libii Game:<br>With over 200 million downloads and growing, Libii is committed to creating innovative games for kids. We'll keep working on establishing a good relationship with both parents and their children and bringing a healthy, happy atmosphere for them.<br>Visit us: http://www.libii.com/<br>Like us: http://www.facebook.com/LibiiGame<br>Contact us:<br>Got any ideas? Suggestions? Need technical support? Please feel free to contact us 24/7 at WeCare@libii.com</p><p>Need You Know:<br>This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Girls是一个独特的Andr​​oid应用程序，教你如何画Fluttershy，苹果白兰地，小指馅饼，暮光之耀一步一步！绘画被认为是非常复杂的。你不会相信多么容易它可以与这个应用程序。这个程序是适合教学自己和你的孩子如何画画，对艺术教育工作者一个伟大的工具，和一个有趣的活动，家人和朋友可以一起做！<p>在学画画的应用程序包括一个大集合图纸上的任何问题。你一定能找到你真正想要的！</p><p>的方式如何绘制：Equestria女孩人物教程的工作很简单。你选择，你想画列表中的教程。那么你模仿每一个步骤绘制你选择什么。你可以把应用程序无论你走到哪里，并画出你所选择的介质上。绘图纸，黑板，人行道，就看你了！<br>&nbsp;<br>以下是您可以与绘图期望的功能列表：从Equestria应用程序的女孩：</p><p>•免费使用！<br>•便携式，易于 Ice Pops Salon is an amazing DIY sweets making app that lets anyone make cool frozen candy in their very own virtual kitchen. You have all the ingredients you need to create a yummy DIY dessert, everything from fun flavors to fruit, yogurt, candy and other sweet treats. If you're ready to make your own DIY frozen candy treat, all you have to do is step into the kitchen and get started!<p>A good ice pop starts with a sweet, yummy flavor. Choose your favorite tastes and toss them into the blender. Be creative and add whatever cool things you like, it's your treat, after all! Turn on the blender and watch it make your drink, then pour the mix into the molds and wait until they're frozen. When your ice pops are ready to eat, pull them out, add toppings like candy, chocolate, nuts and more, then share with your friends. It may be a virtual kitchen, but the smiles are real!</p><p>Features:<br>- Create sweet and yummy DIY ice pops!<br>- Thousands of cool flavors to choose from. These lovely pet babies encountered something terrible, and need the pet doctor’s help in a hurry, and you are just the one we need!!!<br>In this app ---- Pet Doctor, you can use many different kinds of medical instruments to treat the pet babies’ illness. Here you can do all the following things for them, such as taking body temperature, infusing, measuring blood pressure, taking X-ray picture, putting ice packs and so on. You not only have nearly 20 medical instruments to use to cure the pet babies, but also can take advantage of many toys to make them happy. No matter in the treatment process or finish treating, please don’t forget to take a snapshot for the cute pet baby!<br>Therefore, if you really feel interested and excited about such a hospital game related to pet babies, please do not hesitate any more, join our amazing Pet Doctor, and enjoy the experience of being a professional pet doctor!!!<br> <br>How To Play:<br>Open Pet Doctor, choose a little pet baby you like to start the game. At the bottom of the screen, you can choose different medical instruments to treat the pet baby, such as dragging the cotton swab to clean the wounds, dragging the tweezers to remove the wood splinters, dragging the X-ray machine onto the patient to find out the fracture parts, dragging the band-aid to cover the patient’s scatches, and dragging the ice packs to the patient’s forehead to lower the temperature, etc. Meanwhile, the band-aid, ice packs, infusion bottle have many different styles to choose. Kolo童心塗色 - 第一本  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Doodle+Joy+Studio" title="Doodle Joy class="description">  Kolo童心塗色是Doodle Joy Studio出品的塗色本系列。 “Kolo”諧音“Color“。<p>這是系列中的第一本，有120多張有趣的繪本圖片。</p><p>”Kolo童心塗色“希望能讓孩子們在手機或者平板上重享我們在真正的紙上塗色的樂趣。和別的一般的只支持自動塗色的遊戲不同，Kolo童心塗色讓孩子們自由選擇喜歡的畫筆和顏色，一筆一筆的將​​圖片染色，就像在真的紙上玩塗色遊戲一樣。遊戲有精妙的設計，每一筆都不會超出自己的色塊區域，所以孩子們可以任意地給某個區域用畫筆著色而不會塗臟別的地方。遊戲還能存儲和回放整個塗色過程，就像小電影一樣。孩子們超愛用這個功能來分享自己的快樂。</p><p>Kolo童心塗色系列的繪本圖片都是由Doodle Candy will appreciate your help very much!<p>How to Play:<br>Welcome to Candy’s Supermarket! “Ting~!” Here come our customers, firstly please give them a shopping tool as request, then you can start shopping with them! You can drag the screen to view the whole place, and tap different goods shelves to begin related games. If there stands by a customer, you need to help him pick out what he needs, for example, if he wants to write something down, you’d better recommend him a notebook, a pen and a bottle of ink. However, if you think the customers can go shopping by themselves, you can go to assist Candy with some other business, such as tapping a shelf with no customers around and settle it! As soon as you complete any task, you’ll get some loving hearts from the customers or Candy. With these loving hearts, you can exchange for your favourite achievements which will be displayed on the wall of the entrance! No matter what you do, you will feel proud of helping others!</p><p>Features:<br>- Over 20 characteristic mini games<br>- 8 kind characters are in need<br>- 7 shopping areas for managing<br>- More than 80 amazing goods offered<br>- You can exchange for exquisite achievements by collecting loving hearts<br>- Much more hidden fun elements are waiting for you to discover<br>- Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions</p><p>Need You Know:<br>This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Patients will walk to the door one by one, click the door to open it then the patient will come to the seat. Tap the patient who sits in the lobby, he/she will lie on the dentistry chair automatically, after that, you can start to cure the patient. In Libii Dentist, every patient may have different teeth sickness, and every dental tool is used only for the specified sickness, the instruction board beside will give you tips about how to use the tool. After you heal one sickness successfully, a tick will appear on the board to remind you, then you can start to treat another one. When you finished curing all teeth sickness of one patient, you can take a photo for him/her, also your patient can change various expressions by taping his/her face. Panda's Newborn Baby Doctor  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Nutty+Apps" title="Nutty Apps">Nutty Apps</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.nuttyapps.panda.baby.doctor"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5udXR0eWFwcHMucGFuZGEuYmFieS5kb2N0b3IQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Pandas have baby sisters too, you know! Pandas have newborn mommies as well and panda baby care is just as important. Little babies can be annoying, even if they are cute little panda babies. Nutty Apps presents this very cute game for your kids&nbsp;and the fun part is that it is all about pandas. Panda&nbsp;newborn mommy, panda&nbsp;baby care, panda’s little baby, panda beauty salon makeovers, panda daycare and so much more.&nbsp;<p><br>For fun with pandas, for beauty salon makeovers and beauty salons, and little baby pampering download this game and enjoy the pandas. Moreover, we offer a fun hospital adventure in which the little kids get smart&nbsp;for the baby sister to come. They take the pregnant mommy panda to the doctor’s office, as in the hospital. Help them pamper their mommy! Daycares can be a lot of fun! Play with little kids in the daycare and give them an awesome beauty salon makeover. Enjoy the arrival of your baby sister in nurse’s office of the doctor’s office. At&nbsp;the end you can get a go at&nbsp;Panda baby care!</p><p><br>Hospitals, nurse’s office, doctor’s office all keep busy with the pandas. They little kids get their&nbsp;newborn mommies to the hospital to get them well. Before they take their pregnant mommies to the doctor’s clinic, they take them to the beauty salon for a makeover luxury. Makeover is a real luxury,&nbsp;especially&nbsp;for newborn mommies. You can enjoy offering this luxury to a&nbsp;panda newborn mommy. Little babies are cute, yes! But they are cuter when they are panda babies. So enjoy the little babies and play with these little kids in the nurse’s clinic and hospitals. Pamper the little panda, the new baby sister that pregnant mommy has brought to life. Take mommy to the doctor’s office and check her health. </p><p><br>►►►►►FEATURES◄◄◄◄◄</p><p><br>►Have fun with the little kid baby sister&nbsp;in the clinic!</p><p><br>►Play with&nbsp;newborn mommy and give&nbsp;her a luxury makeover!&nbsp;</p><p><br>►Pamper the newborn baby&nbsp;and explore the loveliness of baby care!&nbsp;</p><p><br>►Beauty Salon makeover for pregnant mommy and daycare fun for little babies!&nbsp;</p><p><br>►Fun with Panda baby care!&nbsp;</p><p><br>============================================================</p><p><br>PRIVACY POLICY:<br>As a designer of kids’ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. 照顾你的小朋友 ★★★ </p><p>你救助的动物，它们的日子并不总是好过，然而幸运的是，它们至少已经遇到了你。经过初步检查，确定目前的健康状况，并建立任何必要的治疗后，就可以开始在动物救援中心的生活了。向日葵动物救援中心不是动物园。你要照顾你的小朋友，供给它们食物和水，并确保它们窝里总是有新鲜的垫料。当动物们拥有所需要的一切以后，它们很快就会欢快起来！</p><p>★★★ </p><p>当然，动物在你的照料下可能是最好的，但它们最终还是需要一个真正的家。只要动物救援中心的领导，一个脾气暴躁的教授，让你负责动物收养过程，你就需要为动物找到喜欢可爱的小猫咪，小仓鼠或小兔子的最合适的新主人。当你注意到动物的需要和主人的喜好时，没有什么可以阻止他们的幸福之路。</p><p>★★★带有梦幻般3D图形的动物游戏应用★★★</p><p>"宠物世界3D：我的动物救援”不只游戏乐趣无穷，在视觉上也是一种享受。从井中舀水和找到正确的食物，这会让你对动物救援 </p><p>你将有机会照顾许多动物，如仓鼠、豚鼠和兔子。此外，你可以在应用程序中购买，这将解锁新的游戏选项，包括猫、狗、爬行动物或小马驹。当然，基于你照顾动物的成绩，以及动物成功被收养的频率，新的惊喜正在等着你。</p><p>那么：快来向日葵动物救援中心吧，你的新朋友都在等着你！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p>    Pet Baby Care  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Libii" title="Libii">Libii</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.libiitech.petbabycare"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5saWJpaXRlY2gucGV0YmFieWNhcmUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Boys and girls, do you love pet babies? If you love them so much, please come to Libii soon to see these cute pet babies, here we have baby kitten, bunny, monkey and puppy! If you want to know what these pets look like in their baby time, if you want to take care of them by yourself and play with them happily, welcome to our “Pet Baby Care”! In this brand-new app, you can experience the feeling of being parents through looking after these babies from morning to night, moreover, you can take snapshots for them in their growing up period, we are pretty sure in those time that you stay with these pet babies, you’ll fall in love with all of them!!!<p>How To Play:<br>Open Pet Baby Care, choose your favorite pet baby to start the game. You’ll play the game from the morning of the day, give the pet baby her favorite toy, change the diaper for her, then come to the dress up room to choose the cutest clothes for her, as well as the pretty decorations,  lovely hats, and various funny toys. After these dress up process, you can enjoy your pet baby’s new image but don’t forget to take a snapshot for your nice pet baby! Next, it’s pet baby’s lunch time, you’ll have many different kinds of food to feed her, such as milk, toasted bread, fruit and so on, after she eats and drinks enough, the pet baby comes to the playing room, here she can play some interesting toys, such as the skateboard, toy train, etc. What’s more, you can also take the pet baby to play outside, in Libii’s little playground, she can choose to play the children’s slide, trampolining, or the seesaw happily. If the pet baby is sick, you’ll take her to the treatment room, here you can diagnose her and feed her the right medicine so she will recover soon. Before go to bed, you can also take the pet baby to the bathroom to have a bubble bath. Finally, the pet baby will come to her bedroom, here she has a lot dolls to sleep with her, along with the lullaby from the sound recorder. So this is a colorful day of our cute pet baby, goodnight sweetie, have a nice dream now.</p><p>Features:<br>· 4 cute pet babies to choose from (baby kitten, baby bunny, baby monkey and baby puppy)<br>· From morning to night you’ll see 8 different scenes<br>· This app contains all the aspects of eating, dressing up, playing, taking care, medical treating and so on<br>· Several cute diapers to choose<br>· Several funny nipples to choose<br>· Many pretty clothes to choose for the pet babies<br>· A lot decoration items to choose for the pet babies<br>· Some lovely hats to choose for the pet babies<br>· Plentiful interesting toys to give the pet babies to play<br>· Choose to play some toys inside the playing room<br>· Choose to take the pet babies out to play the outside rides <br>· Take snapshots for your cute pet babies in different scenes, and the snapshots can be saved in your photo album<br>· Share your lovely pet babies via Facebook or E-mail with just one click <br>· Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions</p><p>Need You Know:<br>This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings.  たこやきコロタン ～秘密のレシピ～  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Sorairo,+Inc." title="Sorairo, Inc.">Sorairo, Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.jp.sorairo.corotan"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFm5ldC5qcC5zb3JhaXJvLmNvcm90YW4QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ◆◆◆予想外の累計５０万人突破！！◆◆◆<br>まさか「たこやき」を育てることになるとは・・・<br>（26歳女性）<br>たこやきバトルって・・・(゜ロ゜；)<br>（18歳学生）<p>たこ焼きの季節到来！大規模バージョンアップ！</p><p>『たこやきコロタン　～秘密のレシピ～』は、たこ焼をつくることで生まれる妖精コロタンやその仲間たちと一緒にたこやき生活を味わう、ちょびっと変わったお料理＆育成ゲームだよ！ </p><p>※※※※アイテムの価格改定のお知らせ※※※※<br>本日、諸事情により、本アプリのアイテム販売価格が変更となりました。<br>アイテムを購入する際には、最終確認のウィンドウで表示される価格をご確認いただけますようお願いいたします。<br>※ご利用の端末により、価格の変更反映までの時間が異なる場合がございます。</p><p>★リアルにたこ焼つくりましょ！<br>３Ｄを使って、たこ焼きのあのコロコロ感を再現！<br>思い存分コロコロしちゃってくださいな！<br>うまくたこ焼をつくると、とっても可愛いたこやき妖精にへーんしーん（変身）！！</p><p>★たこやき妖精そだてましょ！<br>生まれたたこやき妖精にごはんを上げたり、きげんをとったりすると、ハッピーポイントが溜まって、妖精はレベルアッープ！<br>レベルが上げれば進化もしちゃうよ！</p><p>★妖精バトルで腕試し！<br>あなたの育てた妖精には、いろんなプレイヤーがバトルを仕掛けてくるよ！<br>しっかり育てて、相手の妖精をやっつけちゃおう！<br>バトルに勝つとＧＯＬＤや貴重なアイテムが手に入るよ！！</p><p>★たこやき妖精コンプしよ！<br>タコヤ先生をはじめちょっと変わったキャラクターたちが出すミッションをクリアして、新しい秘密のレシピを手に入れよう！<br>そして目指すは、たこやき妖精コンプリート！<br> <br>◆価格<br>アプリ本体：無料<br>※一部有料アイテムがあります。</p><p><br>◆その他注意事項 <br>・セーブについて <br>セーブは自動で行っています。 <br>セーブ中にアプリを終了、または電源を切ると、 セーブデータが破損することがあります。 <br>ゲームを終了するときは、キッチン画面からメニューを選び、その中の「保存して終了」を押して、タイトルに戻ってからアプリを終了するようにしてください。<br>また、セーブデータ（ゲームのポイント、妖精やそのレベル、ＧＯＬＤ、具材、インテリア等）が、いかなる理由又は原因で破損、もしくは喪失したとしても、保証は致しません。<br>予め、ご了承の上、ダウンロードをお願いいたします。<br>※電池残量が十分にある状態でのプレイを推奨いたします。 </p><p>・通信について <br>本アプリは、ゲームプレイ中に通信を行っており、通信環境の悪いところでは、ゲームをプレイ出来ません。<br>通信状況の良い場所でプレイをしてください。 </p><p>・時刻設定について<br>本アプリはサーバーと通信することで時刻を取得しており、お持ちの端末の時刻とサーバーとの時刻が異なりますとプレイすることが出来ません。 <br>日付と時刻は、一般設定より自動設定にされることを推奨いたします。 </p><p>・不正行為について<br>本アプリでは、下記のような不正行為を行ったユーザーに対しては、しかるべき制裁措置をとる場合があります。<br>　不正プログラムを使用する行為<br>　不正プログラムを制作または配布する行為<br>　詐欺行為を行い、不適切な利益を得る行為<br>　不正な方法で、ハッピーポイントやGOLD等を獲得する行為<br>　ゲーム内バグを悪用する行為<br>　事実と異なる情報を入力してアカウントを生成する行為<br>　その他、当社が不正行為と判断する行為</p><p>・その他<br>本アプリのルール、テキスト、内容等、キャラクターデザイン等、断りなく変更することがあります。 予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。</p><p>本アプリは、モデルデータや画像データが多いため、複数のアプリを起動されていますとアプリが突然終了することがあります。<br>他のアプリを完全に終了させてから本アプリを起動するか、またはメモリの解放を行う等、十分なメモリの確保をされてから本アプリを起動するようにお願いいたします。<br>特に以前の機種などをご使用の方は、予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。</p><p>・価格帯の変更について<br>10/17、プラットフォーマー（本ゲームがプレイできる環境としてのプラットフォームを提供する事業者）の販売価格帯の変更に伴い、本ゲームにおきましても、価格帯を統一する上でゲーム内の価格を変更致しました。<br>お客様にはご迷惑をお掛けいたしますが、ご利用時はご注意を頂けますようお願い申しあげます。</p><p><br>【お願い】<br>不具合に関しましては、ゲーム内の「キッチン」画面の左下にある「メニュー」から「オプション」の中の「問い合わせ」からお問い合わせください。<br>レビューにアップされましても、情報が足りない等の理由から対応が出来ない可能性がございます。<br>出来る限り、お客様の要望を組み込み、より楽しいゲームを目指したく思っておりますので、ご協力頂ければ幸いです。<br> </p><p>◆対応OS<br>Android 2.2以上の機種でのみ動作致します。<br>ただし、一部の機種ではご利用になれない場合がございます。</p><p>※タブレットでも動作することを確認しておりますが、本アプリは、モデルデータや画像データが多いため、アプリが突然終了することがありますので、サポート対象外とさせて頂きます。予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。</p><p>※推奨端末以外のサポート、補償等は致しかねますので予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。</p><p>※本アプリのバージョンアップ等に伴って、推奨端末や対応ＯＳのバージョンを変更する場合がございますが予めご了承ください。</p><p>※ＯＳのバージョンアップにより、本アプリに問題が出る場合がございますが予めご了承ください。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> If you want to get higher scores, you can buy some ability props before challenging, while you’ll have 99 standby props at most but only 3 chances to use during each challenge. Before time’s up, you’ll get one shot to buy another 8 seconds to continue. Then the stars and rewards will be given according to your scores when the challenge ends. Moreover, when you buy the suits or decorations for your partner in the dressing room and get toys in Toy Catcher, bonus scores will be awarded based on your collections. Help the kids go on an amazing adventure trip with their family by exploring the cruise ship, solving mini games, and having an awesome dinner party at the end of the day!<br> <br> Cruise Mania is filled with different mini games the whole family can enjoy. Start with a pipe connecting game that's all about repairing the ship's lines, then help serve drinks at the dinner party by handing them out to family travelers. Continue the adventure by heading to the repair and clean up rooms where you can fix the engine and clean up kids who fell in the pool! At the end of the day, end your adventure by traveling back to your family's room, cleaning yourself up and getting dressed for an amazing dinner party.<br> <br> Features:<br> - Go on a sea adventure with your family.<br> - Play in a ton of game rooms on your trip.<br> - Repair the ship as it travels across the sea.<br> - Help the travelers have a good trip.<br> - Dress up, clean up and go to a Chocolate Maker Crazy Chef  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TabTale" title="TabTale">TabTale</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tabtale.chocolatemaker"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS50YWJ0YWxlLmNob2NvbGF0ZW1ha2VyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Did you ever dream that you could make your very own chocolate? You can make dolphins, planes, balloons, accordions, and even make a birthday cake-shaped chocolate! </p><p>★ Now Freeze!<br>Put the chocolate in the freezer, and look at our friendly thermometer to make sure you take it out in time like a real cook! </p><p>★ Make it yours with your decorations- and icing!<br>Decorate it! You can put candy hearts, chocolate swirls, candy canes, chocolate bowties, and crowns! When you’re done with these decorations, don’t forget the icing! </p><p>★ Box it up!<br>Once you made your chocolate, you can put it in a box for anyone you want!You can decorate your box too! No two chocolates in your chocolate maker box will be the same! Choose from four different themes including animals, vehicles, instruments, and celebrations!</p><p>★ Eat it, Shake it, Show it!<br>Now for the cook’s delight: once you’ve decorated your decadent creation it is ready for eating! You were the maker, now you are the eater! But it’s not just to eat, it’s ready to drink too! Throw it into the blender with milk and make a delicious shake!</p><p>Chocolate Crazy Chef - Make Your Own Box of Chocolates Features:<br>&gt; Put all the ingredients in bowl and start the chocolate mix, with all the special ingredients you can think of, like a crazy cook!<br>&gt; Pick your mold and pour in the chocolate!<br>&gt; Put the mold and chocolate in the freezer but be careful, too long in the freezer and your chocolate won’t be good!<br>&gt; Add icing on the chocolate; put as much as you want!<br>&gt; Place all of your four unique chocolates in a gift box!<br>&gt; Put the chocolates in a blender and then you can have a milkshake too!  <br>          <br>What's inside Chocolate Crazy Chef - Make Your Own Box of Chocolates:<br>&gt; 16 cute chocolate molds!<br>&gt; 10 delicious icing flavors for the best chocolate maker!<br>&gt; 29 different flavors for your chocolates!<br>&gt; 75 decorations for the chocolate!<br>&gt; Don’t forget to decorate the box too with 10 ribbons, 10 stickers, and 10 wishes!</p><p>ABOUT TabTale <br>With over 500 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. Nail Salon 2  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Libii" title="Libii">Libii</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.libiitech.nailsalon2"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5saWJpaXRlY2gubmFpbHNhbG9uMhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Dear fans of manicure, here comes the big news: Libii's Nail Salon 2 has finally come out! <p>Well, you know a nice suit is to your body what a delicate manicure is to your fingers. So take the chance here to design your dream fingers and make them happen!</p><p>A promotion of the game is that you can choose any of the 6 themes to design the special manicures. Beyond that, three kinds of polish colors are available, tons of decorations are prepared, and even lots of artistic samples are ready-made. Do you itch to have a try now? Oh, just wait a second because we have another great news for you! Libii will hold the Best Nails of the Week to find the excellent designers. </p><p>If manicure is an art, then only in this world top palace can you realize your art dream. </p><p>How to play:<br>Open the game and tap "Themes" on the bottom left to choose one before you begin your work. Now follow us to find out some helpful skills of the game. Firstly, you can start with either hand or switch them by clicking the hand icon on the right. And the icon above it can help you change the skin colors. Then you can tap each nail to zoom in and design it in your own way, you’ll easily distinguish every single finger from each other. Here offers a little tip, if you want the other 4 fingers same with the designed one, tapping "Apply To All" will be helpful and the "Apply To Both" can help you unify the two hands. Last but not the least, you can tap the Menu button on the top left to find the camera icons. Just take a photo for or with your design and click "Contest" to submit it for our new weekly award. All right, have you got all the skills and will you become the hottest master of manicure? Come to challenge! People with ideas are found everywhere, but only people with creativity will stand out from all designers.</p><p>Features:<br>- 6 distinctive themes are optional<br>- 3 kinds of polish colors give you over 100 choices in total<br>- Plenty of elegant tattoos, crafted rings and gorgeous bracelets are ready for free combination<br>- The art dotting tools offer you an easy way to decorate your works<br>- Tons of beautiful decorations and patterns are well-designed <br>- A new Weekly Award is waiting for your creative works<br>- Got any ideas? Suggestions? Need technical support? Baby Hazel Siblings Day  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Axis+Entertainment" title="Axis Entertainment">Axis Entertainment</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.org.axisentertainment.BabyHazelSiblingsDay"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaOAo2EjQKLmFpci5vcmcuYXhpc2VudGVydGFpbm1lbnQuQmFieUhhemVsU2libGluZ3NEYXkQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  It is Siblings Day today!  Cute siblings Baby Hazel and Baby Matt want to celebrate and make this day special for each other. Can you help them in celebrating Siblings Day with joy and merrymaking? Help them to create cute gifts to surprise each other.  Assist  Baby Hazel to keep her baby brother happy by feeding  tasty food and playing funny games with him. Enjoy!<p>The game features many cute and interactive fun-filled role playing activities for kids, like playing with Hazel and Matt in their playroom and playing Peek-a-boo. NOW, enjoy watching Baby Hazel make funny faces at Matt while playing Peek-a-Boo. Find out what gift Baby Hazel makes for her darling brother Matt.</p><p><br>Game features:</p><p>♪ Different interactions as well as role play elements for kids like playing, cooking, feasting, Peek-a-Boo and much more…<br>♪ It’s Matt's playtime! title="Pet Food Train"> 302.    Pet Food Train  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Libii" title="Libii">Libii</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.libiitech.petfoodtrain"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5saWJpaXRlY2gucGV0Zm9vZHRyYWluEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Hi boys and girls, here arrives our Pet Food Train. All the animals from Libii come to pay us a visit, let’s join the train food team together! Follow it to travel around the world making and selling foods! In this App, there are a lot of food to choose to cook! Every single special carriage has its own food, and each kind of food has its particular cooking method. We have got fried drumstick, fruit drinks, barbecue, ice creams, hot dogs, cotton candies, popcorn, french fries and hamburgers. Here you can earn gold coins by cooking and selling food, then use them to buy and decorate your stations and more food carriages. Don’t forget to log in everyday to get more coins! So if you are really feeling excited about this cate game, please do not hesitate any more, join our Pet Food Train and start our gourmet rally now!<p>How To Play:<br>Open pet food train, choose one food carriage you like to start the game. As it starts, there will be some customers, and a heart above his head showing his patience as well as a bubble saying what he wants. There will be some corresponding tools and auxiliary materials on the table, and some main materials for cooking under it. You can drag the corresponding materials in a certain order to make the food that the customers need, when you offer it to the customers, they will give you some coins in return. There will be a trash can on the left side of the table, if you made some food that didn’t suit the customers, you can drag it into the can and make a new one, or you can still offer it to the customers but they may not pay you. Pay attention, the customers’ patience is not very good, if they can’t get what they want for a long time ,the red hearts will turn grey and the customers will leave angrily, in this way you can’t earn any coins! So please focus on what they need and make the satisfying food quickly to get more coins!<br>PS: Every different carriage has a different way to cook food ,at the beginning there will be a short game teaching, follow it and you will learn how to operate soon, after that you can formally welcome your customers!</p><p><br>Features:<br>Nine different food carriages to choose<br>The harder cooking carriage will speed your coins making up<br>Log in everyday to get relevant coin rewards<br>With the coins you get you can unlock everything including some that need purchasing<br>Buy some items to decorate your stations and attract more customers<br>Get relative coin rewards according to customers’ satisfy extent, the highest level will be 100 coins<br>Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions</p><p>Need You Know:<br>This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Pet Food Carnival - Merry Xmas  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Libii" title="Libii">Libii</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.libii.petfoodcarnival"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5saWJpaS5wZXRmb29kY2Fybml2YWwQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Hello there! Pet Food Carnival, the largest event of its kind in Libii says hello to you. There's laughter, there's outrageous treat, and there's a plate of fun! <br>This is a place where all foodies around come for goodies. While, no such an event can be perfect without the hero of the show – the chef! You were chosen as a volunteer chef to join this big event, remember? So don't lose yourself here. Now, let's check on the shops. Wow, the shops are bursting with customers who are waiting for the tempting treat to tantalize their taste buds. You won't let them down, right? In return, chef like you to this event will be awarded with lots of coins and loving hearts, with which the foodie town can be redecorated and shops can be upgraded. You would be more than happy to know that stars can even be given to the shop when the loving hearts reach a certain amounts. Boom, the shop just turns into a star class one. Feel good, hah!<br>Sweetie, here's the chance to explore the fun of the event. Ready for the excellent experience on the one-of-a-kind festival? Alright, let's get moving!<p>How to play<br>Open the game, the overall view of the foodie town will be revealed. Slide the screen to choose the right shop you want to help. For your convenience, the first customer will be served under the instruction. Remember always to keep an eye on customers' preferences which can be told from the bubbles above them and serve them according to what they need. Please drag the ingredients offered on the table in a certain order to make the food which suits the customers' need. There will be a trash can on the left side of the table, so if you made the wrong food, just drag it into the can and make a new one. Coins will run to you and loving hearts will embrace you after the service. Here's a good advice: don't make the customers upset by keeping them waiting for too long, or you'll get nothing if they lose their patience and just leave. So push yourself a little bit and give them the best service ever. You may have noticed that there's a big store in this area. Let's help more shops so you can earn enough coins to have a good look of the store. Pumpkin lamp, Christmas tree, heart railing…Exchange whatever you like to rebuild here. Oh, the shops also call for improvement. The loving hearts will certainly do you a big favor to turn the eatery into a high-end gourmet shop. class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  *** 公主著色頁由RMS兒童遊戲 Gingerbread Crazy Chef  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TabTale" title="TabTale">TabTale</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tabtale.christmasgingerbreadcookiemaker"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaNQozEjEKK2NvbS50YWJ0YWxlLmNocmlzdG1hc2dpbmdlcmJyZWFkY29va2llbWFrZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ★★★ Christmas Has Never Tasted Better with the Gingerbread Crazy Chef Cookie Maker Game!<br>★★★ Get Ready for a Xmas Bake-Off &amp; Create Dozens of Funky Gingerbread Cookies &amp; Shakes!<br>★★★ Ridiculously Fun and Hilarious Designs Make this Xmas Shake-n-Bake Game Sensational!<p>It’s time for a holiday virtual bake off! And the good news for parents - the Gingerbread Crazy Chef Cookie Maker game is lots of fun, but no messy clean up!  Kids can get ready for Christmas and the holidays, tap into their creative, crazy chefs and bake a batch of awesome Gingerbread cookies. Gather your ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, butter &amp; ginger.  Crack an egg and mix it up with a spoon. The Gingerbread Crazy Chef lets kids play baker and roll out their dough with a rolling pin, stretch it and make and bake the perfect cookie dough.</p><p>When the Gingerbread cookies are ready, it’s time to get creative and decorate. There are endless super silly and totally cool outfits to choose from in the Gingerbread Crazy Chef Cookie Maker app.  Create a Santa Claus cookie or a super hero.  Kids can accessorize their cookie creations and show them to friends or relatives.  And when they are done, kids can virtually eat their cookie, turn it into a gingerbread shake with the help of our cool blender or decorate a festive glass and drink it up!</p><p>Bake cookies this Xmas for all of your friends and family!  This Gingerbread Cookie Baker app will make Christmas taste even better!   This cookie maker game is super fun and a Xmas sensation!  Play chef with your friends and make it a cookie baking competition!  Bake as many cookies as you can eat!   </p><p><br>What’s Inside the Gingerbread Crazy Chef Cookie Maker:<br>✔ 20 different cookie types to choose from! Superheroes, pop stars, elves, Santa &amp; more<br>✔ 6 backgrounds add to the design: a Christmas tree, in the snow around town &amp; more<br>✔ 30 accessories including: a basketball, baseball bat, reindeer horns, guitars &amp; more<br>✔ 30 candies to decorate your cookie, make a Santa Claus or a crazy Christmas cookie<br>✔ Dozens of wacky and awesome clothes, pants, shirts &amp; costumes to play around with<br>✔ 30 different noses, 30 eyes and 30 funny mouths for your cookie creation<br>✔ Make a shake with the gingerbread cookie with milk &amp; a blender<br>✔ 11 festive glasses to choose from to drink your shake<br>✔ 20 fun stickers and designs to decorate your glass for a Xmas Gingerbread shake </p><p>Features:<br>✔ Touch &amp; drag to mix up the ingredients &amp; stretch out the dough<br>✔ Touch the oven to start the baking! But don’t let the cookies burn!<br>✔ Gobble up the cookie and watch it disappear<br>✔ Press the cool RESTART button and kids can eat their cookie over and over again!<br>✔ Take the cookie and turn it into a gingerbread shake in a blender!</p><p>ABOUT TabTale <br>With over 400 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. Don’t let it get too hot or too cold!</p><p>Messy Dress Up!<br>Once Zoe, Molly, Lucy, and Alex are clean again, they’re ready to wear some super cute fashion! In the Dress Up Room, choose from adorable dresses, hairstyles, shoes, bags and more to complete their style! </p><p>Visit all the wacky rooms to collect all your stars! With all of the rooms, tools, and clothing choices, you can spend hours making every little girl look perfect! </p><p>Features:<br>&gt; Tap to choose between 4 different girls and 5 different rooms!<br>&gt; Slide to pull dirty garbage out of the drain in the Starry Room<br>&gt; Tap the shower to fill up and the drain to empty out the water in the Hearts Room<br>&gt; Use different taps in the Flower Room to choose between hot and cold!<br>&gt; Wipe steam away from the screen in the Butterfly Room<br>&gt; Drag any of our tools to help clean up these girls for dress up time!<br>&gt; Take pictures when you’re done to show off your work!</p><p>What's inside:<br>&gt; 12 tools like the hair brush, foot cleaner, tweezers and more! Don’t forget to clip her nails!<br>&gt; 4 different girls to choose from!<br>&gt; 4 wacky rooms, to get each girl all cleaned up!<br>&gt; 1 dress up room full of outfits and accessories!<br>&gt; 24 dress up instruments to make each girl super stylish! </p><p>ABOUT TabTale<br>With over 400 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. 汽車愛好者大多是崇拜他們的車像他們最親密的朋友，因此需要最好的照顧，以保持車輛在最佳狀態。雖然應用程序洗車項目是為孩子的娛樂，但我們可以引誘那車熱情的人會採取情有獨鍾通過玩這個免費的Android應用程序。<p>如何發揮應用程序</p><p>這是簡單而有趣的超級洗車比賽對你的指尖玩。一旦你已經打了啟動按鈕，你會得到你的車庫，你可以創建你的名字在你的屏幕上的車。現在，你必須選擇一個汽車在汽車沙龍，並通過使用不同的虛擬洗工具，你需要洗乾淨並擦乾汽車攜旗下的光澤和正弦完好無損。</p><p>除了洗車，你可以改變它的輪胎，改變它的顏色。總之，你可以根據你照顧你的風格和時尚沙龍坐你的車的照顧。</p><p>該應用程序的特徵</p><p>這是一個有趣的應用程序毫無疑問，這不僅孩子，大人一定會喜歡也玩。你下載的應用程序不過之前，檢查它的其他很酷的功能。</p><p>•可愛和有趣的用戶界面，以抓住玩家的注意力：提供汽車服務的水療中心無形中為你的車，</p><p>•玩家可以命名洗車沙龍按照自己的判斷，或在自己的名字，</p><p>•可以選擇自己的汽車，並把它在你的洗車和維修店</p><p>•您將能夠以清潔汽車徹底通過使用以下步驟，</p><p>•您可以做清潔步驟一步：乾淨的臟車布上，然後用清水沖洗乾淨，然後應用洗潔精，洗好，用烘乾機烘乾，最後申請汽車上光！</p><p>•您可以更改顏色的車，你可以改變受損層，使你的車看起來美妙，並執行太棒了！</p><p>免費的應用程序的Ca</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <br>責任制讓你加到肝有點硬硬der，卻沒有加班費嗎？ <br>天橋下睡覺的乞丐碗中的錢搞不好都比你多！！ <br>今天又被同事挖坑推入，讓你忍不住想開背刺+爆擊嗎？ <br>想報仇嗎？想百倍奉還嗎？想擺脫月領22K的命運嗎？ <br>那就加入巴豆妖國際訓練中心，我們有專業的人員指導您如何鬥垮你的頂頭上司，老闆換你做！ </p><p><br>【故事背景】：<br>　　小巴頂著高學歷的光環畢業，踏入職場，好不容易終於找到一間賞識他的公司，可是儘管小巴天天努力爆肝賣命的工作，卻總是被上司刁難，還被同事們排擠、陷害，每周的績效表，連比他晚進公司的好友都不如…。<br>　　可憐的小巴看著自己的績效表、薪資單，回想起自己進公司時，那個充滿理想抱負的自己…小巴在心中默念著：「昨日種種譬如昨日死，今日種種譬如今日生」，突然小巴像是頓悟般，堅定的握緊拳頭，發誓要讓往上爬，擊敗所有的對手！！ <br>　　小巴開始學習運用手段、拉攏同伴、凝結屬於自己的勢力，準備展開絕地大反攻，小人同事OUT！！機車主管OUT！！苦命小職員一步一步往上爬，勵志中帶點歡樂的帷幕就此拉起！！ Have you ever imagined to receive some unusual customers? Do you want to try a fresh and unique barber game? If your answer is YES, you’ll absolutely feel crazy about our Libii’s special launch ----- Monster Hair Salon!!!  <br>In Libii’s amazing new app, you can enjoy a brand-new and distinctive experience of being a hairstylist, for our characters are not people, they are 4 different monsters: Catwoman, Zombie Boy, Vampire Prince, and Demon Girl!<br>Here you can do a lot of things on the monster’s hair with different tools, such as wash, dry, blow, comb, cut, shave, trim, straight, curl, and color, meanwhile, you can still have plentiful decorations and props to put, not only on the hair, but also on the monster’s face and head, such as interesting accessories, cool masks, attractive glasses, awesome hats and so on. <br>So, if you really feel interested and excited about such a hairstyling game related to monsters, please do not hesitate any more, join us, and start your unique and fresh barber journey in Monster Hair Salon!!!<p>How To Play:<br>Open Monster Hair Salon, choose a character you like to start the game. You can cut the monster’s hair by using scissors, trimmer, or shave knife directly, or you can choose to wash, dry and blow hair before cutting, besides, if you think the hair is too short, you can elongate it by using the hair restorer. After you are satisfied with the monster’s hair length and shape, you can use the curling iron ( hair curler) or the hair straightener to make the hair more stylish. Then, you can choose one or more color sprays to make the hair more pretty. At last, you can choose the accessories you like to put on the monster’s hair, face or head to make it more funny. After all these process, you can enjoy your monster’s new hairstyle but don’t forget to take a snapshot for your cute monster!  </p><p>Features:<br>•	4 funny monsters to choose from (Catwoman, Zombie Boy, Vampire Prince, and Demon Girl)<br>•	Choose from shampoo, shower, towel, and hair dryer to wash the monster’s hair<br>•	Choose hair restorer to elongate the monster’s hair<br>•	Choose comb to model the monster’s hairstyle<br>•	Choose different tools to cut the monster’s hair, such as scissors, trimmer, and shave knife<br>•	Choose from curling iron, straightener, and crimper to make the monster’s hair more stylish<br>•	Plentiful color sprays to choose from, you can use one color or combined them to make the monster’s hair more fashionable<br>•	A huge variety of decoration items to choose, including interesting hair accessories, cool masks, attractive glasses, awesome hats and so on<br>•	Monsters will have funny expressions and sounds when you are styling them<br>•	3 awesome backgrounds with matched music to choose<br>•	Share your cool monsters via Facebook or E-mail with just one click <br>•	Snapshots of your monsters can be saved in your photo album<br>•	Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions</p><p>Need You Know:<br>This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. The victor is the participant who earns the most points, determined by a panel of judges, for leaps, balances, pirouettes (pivots), apparatus handling, and execution. The choreography must cover the entire floor and contain a balance of jumps, leaps, pivots, balances and flexibility movements. Each movement involves a high degree of athletic skill. Physical abilities needed by a rhythmic gymnast include strength, power, flexibility, agility, dexterity, endurance and hand-eye coordination.</p><p></p><p>Hello girls ! Gymnastics Ribbon is not just  dancing with Ribbons. The compulsory elements for the ribbon include flicks, circles, snakes and spirals, and throws. It requires a high degree of co-ordination to form the spirals and circles as any knots which may accidentally form in the ribbon are penalised. During a ribbon routine, large, smooth and flowing movements are looked for.</p><p><br>Now,  How good are you in gymnastics? and how fast can you run? Remove old leaves from the ground with a leaf blower, prepare the soil with a hoe and rake, plant sunflower seeds, water them and add some organic fertilizers. Watch how little seedlings grow into beautiful sunflowers!</p><p>WASH THE DISHES!<br>Rush into the kitchen, grab a sponge, squeeze a drop of dish-washing liquid and wash the pot, plates, cups and other dirty dishes. When the dishes are done, wipe down the table and around the sink!</p><p>TIDY THE ROOM!<br>Put toys, clothes and all other cute things to their places. Then clean the window, wipe down the table, water the flower and vacuum the floor. Just a few simple chores and the room is not dirty any more!</p><p>DO LAUNDRY!<br>Learn how to take care of dirty clothes. Separate whites from colors, load up the washing machine, hang out to dry and do the ironing! But be careful – the iron is hot!</p><p>CLEAN THE BATHROOM!<br>Bathroom in this house is really dirty. Grab your cleaning tools, clean the tub, sink and toilet, mop the floor and see how all dirt goes away!</p><p>VISIT PLAYGROUND!<br>After all this cleaning, mopping and scrubbing reward yourself and go to the playground! Try your luck every day and win extra coins to unlock different parts of the game!</p><p>WHAT’S INSIDE<br>8 different locations to play in<br>2 sweet girls who will help you do the chores<br>More than You will add milk, cream, crack an egg and mix it all up. Choose from 18 delicious flavors. Mix in your flavor and then combine the ice (don’t forget to crush it up!) with your sweet mixture. Put in a bowl and stick it in the freezer. A clock will tell you when the ice cream is ready. It’s such a fun game! </p><p>★ DRESS’EM UP, MAKER! <br>Choose a fun cone or cup and create silly faces on your ice cream for the kids. You can cover them all up with candy and gummy bears if you want, kids love those! You can layer on some syrup too! Choose from 8 types of syrup like strawberry and chocolate! Change the cone at will; don’t worry about spilling! You’re the ice cream maker, let your creativity go wild! </p><p>★ MAKE AND EAT, OR SHAKE AND SIP!<br>Once you are done with making your ice-cream, sit down and enjoy all the ice cream you want! Forest Animals Arts and Crafts  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TutoTOONS" title="TutoTOONS">TutoTOONS</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.com.tutotoons.app.forestanimals"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLQorEikKI2Fpci5jb20udHV0b3Rvb25zLmFwcC5mb3Jlc3RhbmltYWxzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Four little forest animals invite kids to play and learn in the magical forest! Your new pocket friends - Squirrel, Mole, Mouse and Hedgehog - will teach you how to make a yummy cake, do forest art and craft works, collect forest gifts like berries and nuts, and grow your own forest goodies!<p>Don’t get tricked by the looks of these forest animals. They love to get messy while playing and working but they always tidy up, even after taking a bath! Together with forest animals, you will learn how to clean up fast and keep your things neat!</p><p>Game features</p><p>Bake a Cake<br>Cute little mouse and hedgehog will show you how to bake a super delicious cake with wild strawberries. Don’t eat too much because you’ll have to clean up too! Wash the dishes and keep the kitchen tidy after cooking! </p><p>Mushroom Care<br>Little hedgehog likes to grow his own forest goodies in his mini garden. He will teach you how to plant, grow and take care of the most delightful forest mushrooms!</p><p>Squirrel Crafts<br>Crafty squirrel is here to teach you forest arts and crafts. Make a toy from things you can find in the forest and don’t forget to clean up your workspace! Clean the table, throw away garbage and put art tools in their places after fun time of creation!</p><p>Laundry &amp; Dress Up<br>Uh-oh, squirrel’s fur got covered in paint after arts and crafts time. Help her look neat and cute again. Wash Squirrel’s fur, dry it, play dress up and create a nice new outfit for her!</p><p>Pick the Nuts<br>Help the little hedgehog pick hazelnuts and blueberries. Remove tree leaves and icky slugs form these forest goodies. Wash berries and nuts carefully so that forest animals would have some nice snacks!</p><p>Bath Time<br>Mr. Mole was digging all day and got dirty. Help him relax after a long day of work: give the little Mole a warm bubble bath, dry and brush his fur, clean his teeth and take care of the nails. Clean up the bathroom when Mole’s bath time is over!</p><p>Trophy Room<br>Get rewarded for helping forest animals do their chores. Play more, reach new levels and collect all forest trophies!</p><p>Lucky Hour<br>Visit the old forest clock and spin it. You can win up to 500 extra coins if it’s your lucky time!</p><p>Movies<br>Turn on an old TV and watch kids movies with your little forest friends. Play video and get 200 coins!</p><p><br>WHAT’S INSIDE <br>- 9 super fun forest activities and cleanup games<br>- 4 charming forest friends<br>- 70 furry clothes and accessories for squirrel’s dress up<br>- 8 collectible forest trophies<br>- Stunning animations and beautiful graphics<br>- Catchy sounds and music<br>- Easy to play even for small kids</p><p>Discover more fun with TutoTOONS!<br>Play href="/store/apps/details?id=com.tabtale.cakemakercrazychefgoogle" title="Cake Crazy Chef"> 472.    Cake Crazy Chef  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TabTale" title="TabTale">TabTale</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tabtale.cakemakercrazychefgoogle"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLgosEioKJGNvbS50YWJ0YWxlLmNha2VtYWtlcmNyYXp5Y2hlZmdvb2dsZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Master Cake Chef! Make &amp; bake crazy and delicious cakes everyone will want to gobble up!    Choose from dozens of delicious cakes to bake for Birthday, Valentines, Wedding &amp; more! Party planner! Awesome events, invite guests, eat, play &amp; smash up cake for an epic cake-throwing fight! <p><br>It’s time to bake a cake! Different sizes and shapes for all different types of events: Birthdays, Weddings, Welcome home &amp; more! After we bake our cakes to perfection, it’s time for frosting and some totally rad decorations! </p><p><br>Make &amp; Bake Your Cake!<br>Choose your cake style and pick from 20 yummy cake flavors including: chocolate, Gummy Bear, peanut butter and more!  Mix up the batter and pour it into a cool cake pan of your choice; Then bake your cake! Watch the happy face thermometer as it rises and make sure that you don’t let the cake burn!   </p><p><br>Frost &amp; Decorate <br>Add amazing toppings - make fabulous and fun faces! Cover your cake with sweet frosting, cool toppings, and even make faces in your cake. Use our tools to create a cake worthy of a master chef!</p><p><br>Plan Your Party! <br>Choose party signs, flowers, balloons &amp; even fireworks to make your event one to remember. Invite guests to your party, maybe Cinderella wants to check out your party or Snow White! Choose a drink &amp; its fun straw to go along with it! </p><p><br>Cake Fight! <br>You can have a cake fight and smash up a bunch of cakes with the tap of a finger. Now that’s a party! But kids, don’t try this at home!</p><p><br>Features:<br>&gt; Tap to select which kind of cake to make! <br>&gt; Choose to make &amp; bake your cake first, or skip right to decorating!<br>&gt; Touch &amp; drag to mix up the ingredients &amp; stir the batter with a wooden spoon<br>&gt; Touch the oven to start the baking! But don’t let your cake burn!<br>&gt; Special thermometer tells kids when the cake is finished baking<br>&gt; Gobble up your cake and watch it disappear and drink up the beverage!<br>&gt; Press the RESTART button and kids can eat their cake over and over again!<br>&gt; Rotate feature for the to spin decorations in different directions!<br>&gt; Change the size of decorations when you Zoom In &amp; Out! </p><p><br>What's inside:<br>&gt; 20 different cake flavors to choose from: make as many as you want!          <br>&gt; 4 different events such as Birthday, Valentines, Weddings &amp; Welcome Home!<br>&gt; 10 Awesome frostings and toppings to make your cake beautiful! <br>&gt; 20 colorful and fun straws for your milkshake!<br>&gt;  Dozens  of delicious fruits, lollipops, sprinkles, and more sticks to decorate your cake!<br>&gt; 10 different candles &amp; fireworks to help celebrate all kinds of events! <br>&gt; 10 different drinks to choose: milkshakes, juices, lemonade, milk &amp; more!<br>&gt; Dozens of ways to decorate your party, like: signs, flowers, cake stands, and balloons!<br>&gt; 20 princess guests to enjoy the party with you!</p><p><br>ABOUT TabTale <br>With over 500 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. Get ready for a summer camp adventure you will never forget! Choose from 8 amazing activities! You can pitch a tent, roast marshmallows and even go fishing on this awesome nature adventure! Can you help them clean up this messy summer camp? Explore the outdoors as you enjoy fun activities, earn badges and help fix up the messy camp. Play awesome mini-games along the way!</p><p>Campfire!<br>Gather ‘round the campfire! Help the messy kids collect sticks and stones to build a campfire. Enjoy roasted marshmallows - a delicious camping treat! You will even earn a fire safety badge when you put out the fire!</p><p>Tent Time! <br>Hurrah, it’s time to pitch a tent! Catch fish in a variety of shapes, colors &amp; sizes! Careful, beware of the electric eel!  </p><p>Targets &amp; Darts! <br>Shoot darts at the target to earn coins &amp; badges! Camouflage the kids with face paint and masks! Snap a picture of your styling to show off to all your friends!  </p><p>Hidden Animals! <br>There are so many animals outdoors! Meet animal friends as you play this interactive, hidden objects game! Find creatures like grasshoppers, chameleons, frogs &amp; more!</p><p>First Aid Clinic! <br>Sometimes messy kids get injured when playing outdoors. It’s your turn to be the doctor! Use special medical tools to care for the kids and help them feel better! </p><p>Grow a Garden! <br>Gardening is so much fun! Help the messy kids grow a beautiful garden. Plant seeds, water the plants and watch your garden grow! </p><p>Shopping Time! <br>It’s time to go to the market! Use the coins you earned while playing games to buy decorations to fix up the camp. CHAOS是一款两至四人的游戏。<p>每个人都在争夺鹅卵石。身体接触也是游戏的乐趣之一。</p><p><br>------/ 如何进行  /------</p><p>每个玩家为了自己的颜色竞争。鹅卵石在被点击后将会变成其他颜色。点击最多的鹅卵石获得回合胜利。赢得五回合确保胜利。</p><p><br>------/  胜利方法 href="/store/apps/details?id=com.partykidsmobile.android_twinsbabyplayhouseparty" title="My New Baby Twins"> 487. You have to make your home clean and pristine, care for their every need, and even dress them up so they stay happy and healthy. But what if you didn't have just one baby to take care of? What if you had... twins? It's twice the trouble and twice the fun in this creative makeover game just for kids!<p>Get ready to work some makeover magic. These adorable pets have accompanied you for such a long time, today they will guide you how to play the game. If you like, there is a photo studio for you to take pictures with them! For the first time, we open 8 challenging games for you, such as Water Pistol, Whac-A-Mole, Magic Hats and so on. In these games, you need to act quickly with your hands and be sharp-sighted, meanwhile you should always keep your attentions if you want to pass all the levels! Besides, you can try your hand in our Lucky Wheel and get extra rewards in the Big Hammer. And more importantly, some locked games can be purchased by the coins you earn, so why not come to show your talent and enjoy more FREE games? Let’s begin to have fun in our Pet Fairground anytime and anywhere!!<p><br>How to play:<br>Open the Pet Fairground and click Play to start. You can see every game scene by dragging your screen. Then choose one scene you like and the tip will show you the Entrance Fee and LV.1 Reward. After you click Challenge, our working staff will give you the Mission and tell you how to play. If you are ready, click Start for the challenges. Please don’t worry, you can click the question mark on the top right corner to read the explanation again if you miss it before. There are 5 levels in each game, you can get one star after you complete each of the last 3 levels. By the way, if your coins are less than 150, they will be restored gradually. Also, you can try your hand to get extra rewards in our Lucky Wheel and Big Hammer. Now come to challenge all the games and light up every star! Let’s see who is the luckiest and most skillful one!!</p><p><br>Features:</p><p>   * 8 challenging games and 3 mini games<br>   * 5 difficulty levels in each challenging game<br>   * You can take photos with 11 lovely characters<br>   * You can get FREE coins in different ways<br>   * You can take a screenshot to show your victory after you collect all the stars<br>   * Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions</p><p></p><p>Need You Know:<br>This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Girls who enjoy competing in pageants usually love dressing up and feeling special. 聚會遊戲之心有靈犀  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=QstarStudio" title="QstarStudio">QstarStudio</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  你來比劃我來猜，聚會必備遊戲。<p>聚會玩什麽？<br>誰是臥底、殺人遊戲 已經過時，朋友聚會時你來比劃我來猜，看看你們是否心有靈犀；<br>這是一款 雙人遊戲 及 多人遊戲，遊戲規則與比劃猜相同。 <br>丟掉誰是臥底、殺人遊戲，加入心有靈犀吧。</p><p>遊戲玩法：<br>負責猜詞的玩家將手機橫過來面向 負責比劃的玩家；<br>玩家比劃過程中，若猜詞玩家猜出了手機屏幕上的詞，則將手機面向地面，記錄猜對的詞；<br>如果決定跳過當前詞，則將手機面向上方。</p><p>適合 親子、朋友、情侶 在娛樂中增進默契度，快樂無限。<br>遊戲詞庫包含了 明星、日常生活、成語、表演區、流行歌曲、挑戰極限，一定有你的菜。</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.aloha.greatcharade" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span 體育洗車及水療沙龍  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=AvenueGamingStudios" title="AvenueGamingStudios">AvenueGamingStudios</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS5hZ3Muc3BvcnRzLmNhci53YXNoEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  跑車是髒亂差拿去維修站車庫進行清理，並使它看起來新。體育洗車及水療沙龍是一個真棒汽車清理和改造遊戲的孩子哪個孩子們喜歡玩。現在，清理雜亂，泥濘和生鏽的汽車，卡車，汽車，出租車和其他車輛像一個專業，並顯示一些真正的車洗出技能來修復，修復和提升了賽車。這種自動汽車洗衣場比賽是一個有趣的貢獻為所有年齡段的孩子。<p>在第一步，將水在運輸車輛清除所有污物和泥土。然後應用清潔劑，泡沫和洗髮水的海綿的幫助下，並將其應用遍布在搶車。客戶在趕時間所以加快！用刷子洗輪圈，保險槓，輪轂和輪胎，並給他們一個光亮的外觀。清理超級酷車在高峰下一輛車正在等待你的服務的車庫站外。</p><p>&nbsp;然後打開引擎蓋車炸掉灰塵和泥土引擎和調整它。清理在這個車庫，洗衣服務站比賽的內部和外部。現在申請紋身，貼紙，油漆的不同和拋光的車輛其完整的改造和新面貌。</p><p>不要離開車輛的任何垃圾垃圾或粘點。設計的所有汽車，車輛和建立他們一個奇妙的定制傑作。</p><p>打球洗車沙龍的遊戲，並有驚險，吸毒和充滿維修站的暢快體驗。</p><p>產品特點<br>&nbsp;<br>1.沖蝕多個超級跑車<br>2.清理與多個現代化設備的工具和汽車<br>在跑車3.噴漆與您所選擇的顏色<br>4.裝飾汽車紋身貼紙<br>5.有吸引力的圖形和高品質的音樂<br>6.光滑自來水和觸摸遊戲，與孩子友好的內容</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p>
